definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קשׂה]] (√ of foll., meaning dub.; cf. Ar. qa4wah;un basket of palm-leaves; Eth. qa3ut: urn, jar; NH [[קַסְוׇה]] = BH [[קשׂוה]], cf. Targum [[קַסְוׇותָא]], or [[קסתות]]; Talm. [[קִסְטְ]], [[קִיסְטָא]] a measure, Syr. qest.o0 jar, ([[ט]] after [[ק]]), Nö:SB Ak. 1882, 1179 Frä:63, 205 Brock:s. v.).
